title: Living
author: Stephen King
content: Get busy living or get busy dying.

title: The first step
author: Mark Caine
content: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.

title: Twenty years
author: Mark Twain
content: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.”

title: Powerful
author: Audre Lorde
content: When I dare to be powerful – to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.

title: Fail miserably
author: John F. Kennedy
content: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
